standalone-processor-1_start_cmd: cd samza-standalone_failure_testing ; ./gradlew clean build -x test ;  ./samza-shell/src/main/bash/run-class.sh  org.apache.samza.test.integration.LocalApplicationRunnerMain --config-path ./samza-test/src/main/config/standalone.failure.test-processor-1.properties --operation run  ; cd ..
